hints.content:
First, let's fill in $\purpleD{6}\blueE{8}\maroonD4$ on the place value chart.

Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\purpleD{6}$ | $\blueE8$ | $\maroonD4$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD{6}\text{ hundreds} &=\purpleD{600} \\\\
\blueE{8}\text{ tens}&=\blueE{80} \\\\
 \maroonD4\text{ ones}&=\maroonD4
\end{align}$

$684=\purpleD{600} + \blueE{80} + \maroonD{4}$

Now, let's say the number $\purpleD6\blueE8\maroonD4$ out loud and write it in written form.

$\purpleD{\text{six hundred}}\blueE{\text{ eighty-}}\maroonD{\text{four}}$

The following are equivalent to $684$:  

- $600 + 80 + 4$

-  Six hundred eighty-four
